author: Special Correspondent
text:
The valedictory function of the golden jubilee celebrations of D.G. Vaishnav College was held on Tuesday.

V.Shanmughanathan, Governor of Meghalaya, was the chief guest at the function. He also inaugurated the SRG Golden Jubilee Theater and Vaigai Block on the occasion.

M.Venkatramanan, college principal, former principal S.Narasimhan and Govind Das Purushotham Das, chairman of Vallabhacharya Vidya Sabha were among others who were present and spoke on the occasion, a release from the college said.
title: Golden jubilee function ends
